name: To be continued...
description:
The game

The game lets you to be the channel surfing editor of the popular "To be continued..." meme. Click the telly when the situation is most tense, right before something (usually bad) happens. The closer you hit to the right moment, the better score you get (upto 10k points).

Tested only on Chrome 58 on Ubuntu 14.04 and Windows 7.

Credits

  • Miska - game concept and 3D modeling
  • Jussi - code, texturing and project management
  • Petri - the feet
